co.cask.coopr.codec.json.current

Class AbstractBaseEntityCodec<T extends BaseEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.coopr.codec.json.AbstractCodec<T>
      • co.cask.coopr.codec.json.current.AbstractBaseEntityCodec<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of base entity to serialize and deserialize.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<T>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTemplateCodec, AutomatorTypeCodec, HardwareTypeCodec, ImageTypeCodec, ProviderCodec, ProviderTypeCodec, ServiceCodec

    public abstract class AbstractBaseEntityCodec<T extends BaseEntity>
extends AbstractCodec<T>
    Base codec for serializing and deserializing a BaseEntity.
